data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Ural Yekaterinburg are pushing forward but Marco Aratore's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at Central Stadium.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eric Bicfalvi (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 9, Dinamo Moscow pushes forward through Sebastian Szymanski, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Marco Aratore of Ural Yekaterinburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 16, Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In Ekaterinburg, Aleksey Gerasimov (Ural Yekaterinburg) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Nikolay Komlichenko (Dinamo Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Central Stadium, Andrey Egorychev has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Sebastian Szymanski for Dinamo Moscow drives towards goal at Central Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
Daniil Fomin hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Dinamo Moscow in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Andrey Panyukov (Ural Yekaterinburg) strikes at Central Stadium but his header is cleared.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Ekaterinburg.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Goal! Dinamo Moscow have got their heads in front thanks to a Clinton N'Jie strike.
In the minute 38, Sebastian Szymanski instrumental with a fine assist.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Nikolay Komlichenko (Dinamo Moscow) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Central Stadium.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Sergey Parshivlyuk (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Dinamo Moscow drives forward and Nikolay Komlichenko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 55, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at Central Stadium.
Attention is being given to Dinamo Moscowâ€™s Nikolay Komlichenko and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Nikolay Komlichenko has recovered and rejoins the match in Ekaterinburg.
Dinamo Moscow's Clinton N'Jie gets in a shot on goal at Central Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 59, Dinamo Moscow take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Sylvester Igboun.
Great play from Sebastian Szymanski to set up the goal.
Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 62, Roman Emeljanov is replacing Yuri Bavin for the home team.
Roman Emeljanov of Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 64, Dinamo Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow drive upfield and Sylvester Igboun gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ural Yekaterinburg defender.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Central Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sebastian Szymanski, who is down injured.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Central Stadium.
Dinamo Moscow's Sebastian Szymanski is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
David Karaev is on a sub for Andrey Panyukov for Ural Yekaterinburg.
Kirill Novikov (Dinamo Moscow) is making a first change, with Maximilian Philipp replacing the possibly injured Sebastian Szymanski.
Maximilian Philipp (Dinamo Moscow) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 73, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. Dinamo Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 74, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg are coming forward and Marco Aratore gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 76, In Ekaterinburg Ural Yekaterinburg attack through Eric Bicfalvi. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 77, In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team have replaced Sylvester Igboun with Vladislav Karapuzov. This is the second substitution made today by Kirill Novikov.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Sergey Parshivlyuk with Grigori Morozov.
Ural Yekaterinburg make their third substitution with Artem Shabolin replacing Andrey Egorychev.
Varazdat Haroyan is booked for the home team.
Maximilian Philipp (Dinamo Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick in a good position for Dinamo Moscow!
In the minute 80, In Ekaterinburg Dinamo Moscow drive forward through Maximilian Philipp. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
Dinamo Moscow drive upfield and Maximilian Philipp gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ural Yekaterinburg defender.
In the minute 81, Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Important block from the Ural Yekaterinburg defence as Dmitri Skopintsev fires in a strike for Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 83, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Charles Kabore returns to the field for Dinamo Moscow after picking up a slight injury.
Charles Kabore is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 89, David Karaev for Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
Kirill Novikov (Dinamo Moscow) is making a fourth substitution, with Vyacheslav Grulev replacing Nikolay Komlichenko.
In the minute 89, Dinamo Moscow make their fifth substitution with Sergei Slepov replacing Clinton N'Jie.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Can Dinamo Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Sergei Slepov for Dinamo Moscow has been booked by Vitaly Meshkov and receives a first yellow card.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Marco Aratore has been booked in Ekaterinburg.
